page.title: 08Nether Stowey: Trade
page.content: Within this growing community we have seen improved trading facilities for the residents. There is something for everyone. The village has its own dairy, plus milk and dairy produce from Stowey Court Farm. There are several shops selling provisions and greengrocery. An excellent butchers is situated opposite the post office. We have a small antique shop connected to a haberdashery and bookshop. Another store combines a newsagency and ironmongery. There are two hairdressing establishments. The Castle Stores is also a newsagency and video film hire centre. There are three public houses. There is a petrol filling station with a car repair workshop. The village has a bank and an estate agency. The well known old village Bakery has recently closed due to the retirement of the local baker.
